title: H.E. William Benjamin Mkapa | Tanzania Academy of Sciences (TAAS)

quotes: From the year 2005, the Late Benjamin William Mkapa occupied himself with various political and development issues including:-

organizations.name: Baraza la Biashara la Taifa (BBT)
quotes: Baraza la Biashara la Taifa (BBT).

organizations.name: Tanzania Private Sector Foundation (TPSF)
quotes: Tanzania Private Sector Foundation (TPSF) (Taasisi ya Sekta Binafsi Tanzania).

organizations.name: Anglican Church
quotes: he handed over the Mazengo Secondary buildings to the Anglican Church to establish St. John’s University.

organizations.name: St. John’s University
quotes: he handed over the Mazengo Secondary buildings to the Anglican Church to establish St. John’s University.

organizations.name: Catholic Church
quotes: He gave the Iringa Bank College buildings to the Catholic Church in order to establish the Ruaha University;

organizations.name: Ruaha University
quotes: He gave the Iringa Bank College buildings to the Catholic Church in order to establish the Ruaha University;

organizations.name: BAKWATA
quotes: and TANESCO buildings in Morogoro to BAKWATA in order to establish the Islamic University of Morogoro.

organizations.name: Islamic University of Morogoro
quotes: and TANESCO buildings in Morogoro to BAKWATA in order to establish the Islamic University of Morogoro.

organizations.name: Evangelical Lutheran Church of Tanzania (KKKT)
quotes: He also handed over the buildings of the Secondary School Magamba to the Evangelical Lutheran Church of Tanzania (KKKT) so that they may start their Sebastian Kolowa Memorial University (SEKOMU).

organizations.name: Sebastian Kolowa Memorial University (SEKOMU)
quotes: He also handed over the buildings of the Secondary School Magamba to the Evangelical Lutheran Church of Tanzania (KKKT) so that they may start their Sebastian Kolowa Memorial University (SEKOMU).

quotes: Chairperson of the World Commission on the Social Dimension of Globalization

quotes: Chairperson of the Advisory Board Panel of Microsoft Africa

organizations.name: Panel of African Leadership Forum
quotes: Founder Member of the Panel of African Leadership Forum

organizations.name: The Benjamin William Mkapa Foundation (BMF)
quotes: The creation of his Foundation, The Benjamin William Mkapa Foundation (BMF), geared toward combating HIV/AIDS including the improvement of health services delivery system especially in the periphery areas of the country.

organizations.name: University of Dodoma (UDOM)
quotes: Acting as Chancellor of the University of Dodoma (UDOM).

organizations.name: Cavendish University
quotes: Chancellor of the Cavendish University in Uganda.

organizations.name: Aga Khan University
quotes: Serving as member of the Board of Trustees of the Aga Khan University.

quotes: Member, Committee of the Club of Retired African Presidents on the Campaign Against HIV/AIDS.

quotes: Member, Panel of Eminent Persons: Enhancing the development role and impact of UNCTAD.

quotes: Member, Secretary-General’s High-Level Panel on UN System-Wide Coherence in the areas of Development, Humanitarian Assistance and the Environment.

organizations.name: Commission for Africa
quotes: Member, Commission for Africa established by former Prime Minister Tony Blair of the United Kingdom.

organizations.name: African Wildlife Foundation
quotes: Member, Board of Trustees, African Wildlife Foundation.

organizations.name: United Nation’s Panel monitoring Sudan referenda
quotes: Chair of the United Nation’s Panel monitoring Sudan referenda.

organizations.name: African Union
quotes: Co-Mediator and African Union Special Envoy with former President Olusegun Obasanjo of the Republic of Nigeria in the political conflict in DRC.
